mapper.update: update ccontact_all set customer_id = #{customerId}, ccseq = #{ccseq}, cctitle = #{cctitle}, ccname = #{ccname}, ccfname = #{ccfname}, cclname = #{cclname}, ccstreet = #{ccstreet}, ccstreetno = #{ccstreetno}, cclnamemc = #{cclnamemc}, ccaddr1 = #{ccaddr1}, ccaddr2 = #{ccaddr2}, ccaddr3 = #{ccaddr3}, cccity = #{cccity}, cczip = #{cczip}, cctn = #{cctn}, cctn2 = #{cctn2}, ccfax = #{ccfax}, ccline1 = #{ccline1}, ccline2 = #{ccline2}, ccline3 = #{ccline3}, ccline4 = #{ccline4}, ccline5 = #{ccline5}, ccline6 = #{ccline6}, cctn_area = #{cctnArea}, cctn2_area = #{cctn2Area}, ccfax_area = #{ccfaxArea}, ccjobdesc = #{ccjobdesc}, ccdeftrk = #{ccdeftrk}, ccuser = #{ccuser}, ccbill = #{ccbill}, ccbilldetails = #{ccbilldetails}, cccontract = #{cccontract}, ccship = #{ccship}, ccmagazine = #{ccmagazine}, ccdirectory = #{ccdirectory}, ccforward = #{ccforward}, ccurgent = #{ccurgent}, country = #{country}, cclanguage = #{cclanguage}, ccadditional = #{ccadditional}, sort_criteria = #{sortCriteria}, ccentdate = #{ccentdate}, ccmoddate = #{ccmoddate}, ccmod = #{ccmod}, cccounty = #{cccounty}, ccstate = #{ccstate}, ccvaliddate = #{ccvaliddate}, ccbill_previous = #{ccbillPrevious}, welcome_crit = #{welcomeCrit}, ccmname = #{ccmname}, ccemail = #{ccemail}, ccaddryears = #{ccaddryears}, ccsmsno = #{ccsmsno}, ccbilltemp = #{ccbilltemp}, userlastmod = #{userlastmod}, ccvalidation = #{ccvalidation}, ccuser_inst = #{ccuserInst}, cclocation_1 = #{cclocation1}, cclocation_2 = #{cclocation2}, ccremark = #{ccremark}, rec_version = #{recVersion}, marital_status = #{maritalStatus}, csnationality = #{csnationality}, cssocialsecno = #{cssocialsecno}, csdrivelicence = #{csdrivelicence}, csemployer = #{csemployer}, employee = #{employee}, company_type = #{companyType}, id_type = #{idType}, passportno = #{passportno}, birthdate = #{birthdate}, cscompregno = #{cscompregno}, cscomptaxno = #{cscomptaxno}, cscusttype = #{cscusttype}, ccsex = #{ccsex} where customer_id = #{customerId};
